channel.title: Help, please
channel.description:
im new to this whole private server thing, and im not so good at coding. i've tried to change some stuff, but it seems like i need a certian version of java to compile the server. and that "javac isnt a internal or external command"
any idea what im supposed to do, or what im supposed to download? links please.. i've tried downloading some updates but it didnt work, also do i need SCAR, becuase i deleted it, and my system restore dosent work, so i need that link please.
sorry if its in the wrong spot.

item.title: Help, please
item.dc:creator: @Raffeal Raffeal
item.description:
@Raffeal wrote:

okay, for that code what am i supposed to do.
if you could add me on msn it would help. please and thank you
xoxpinkxox4@hotmail.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 08:20:46 PM[/size][hr]hmm[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 08:44:43 PM[/size][hr]i dont knwo what to do with that code[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 02:47:20 AM[/size][hr]lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help, please
item.dc:creator: @mr_h33lz mr h33lz.
item.description:
@mr_h33lz wrote:

if u dont know wat client.java is its a text doc or note pad and the cgf files use mirosoft word to open then hope i helped[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 07:58:27 PM[/size][hr]hey u copyd dat off me lol thats the one i use:O[quote=“MrMoney, post:2, topic:187559”]Use THis as your compiler

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help, please
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

Use THis as your compiler

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
